headline: The Best Vanguard ETF to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) are an excellent way to grow your wealth.  In other words, there are plenty of fantastic Vanguard ETFs to choose from.  In addition, its expense ratio of 0.04% is one of the lowest around.

headline: Gaming industry sees ‘diminished’ returns from graphics investing, NYT reports
summary: For decades, companies like Sony (SONY) and Microsoft (MSFT) made bets that realistic graphics for video games were the key to drawing bigger audiences, with the industry spending billions to pursue the idea, but companies are now acknowledging that investing in graphics is providing diminished financial returns, the New York Times’ Zachary Small reports, citing industry sources. “It’s very clear that high-fidelity visuals are only moving the needle for a vocal class of gamers in their 40s and 5

headline: Cathie Wood Says Software Is the Next Big AI Opportunity -- 2 Super Stocks You'll Wish You'd Bought if She's Right
summary: Ark Investment Management operates several exchange-traded funds (ETFs) focused on innovative technology stocks.  Its founder, Cathie Wood, believes software companies are the next big opportunity in the artificial intelligence (AI) industry, predicting they could generate up to $8 in revenue for every $1 they spend on chips from suppliers like Nvidia.  Wood has invested in AI start-ups like xAI, OpenAI, and Anthropic through the Ark Venture Fund since making that prediction last year, so she's backing up her words with decisive action.
